course_description: Examination of the past, present, and future of Latino politics in the U.S. Analyzes historical and contemporary political preferences, voting, and representation of Mexican, Puerto Rican, Cuban, Dominican, Central American, and other Latino populations, and how Latinos shape U.S.politics broadly.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1442, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: B. Fraga, Status: Wait List
